alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Canovanas; Carolina; Guaynabo; Luquillo; Rio Grande; San Juan; Toa Alta; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 23 at 2:12PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Bayamon, Canovanas, Carolina, Guaynabo, Luquillo, Rio Grande, San Juan, Toa Alta and Trujillo Alto. * WHEN...Until 415 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 109 PM AST, Emergency management reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. - Flooding on Highway 52 has closed Some lanes. Beware of flooding on Highway 1 in and just south of the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Trujillo Alto, Carolina, Canovanas, Rio Grande, Guaynabo, Bayamon, Sabana Seca, Luquillo, Toa Alta, Vieques, Santa Barbara, Campo Rico, San Isidro, La Dolores, Hato Candal, Playa Fortuna, Pajaros, Candelaria and Ramos. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Canovanas; Carolina; Guaynabo; Luquillo; Rio Grande; San Juan; Toa Alta; Trujillo Alto
